About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

My name is Zimrri and I have been building websites since 2012 in high school. I didn’t start building websites for businesses until I was in college. It started as a hobby and now is my own little business. I have been able to help many small businesses with their websites. I specialize in developing easy-to-edit websites so my clients can easily manage their own website. I share my knowledge with my clients and create little videos teaching them how to edit their websites. Please feel free to contact me. I look forward to working with you!

Easy to Use

I build websites using WordPress, which makes editing your website as easy as editing a Word document. For more complex websites I spend a great deal of time crafting the backend experience so even non-technical users can easily manage it.

Fast and Secure

I’ll be your technical partner, not simply a coder. I’ll provide hosting recommendations to ensure the best performance of your website.

Mobile Responsive

Your website should work great on all devices. Responsive web design allows site elements to adjust for mobile and tablet, like rearranging content blocks and mobile-friendly menus.
